lead_paragraph: Spanning nearly 40 years from 1925 to 1964, two Texas farm boys straight-arrow Gid and laid-back Johnny fight over the affections of the beautiful and headstrong Molly Taylor.
snippet: Spanning nearly 40 years from 1925 to 1964, two Texas farm boys straight-arrow Gid and laid-back Johnny fight over the affections of the beautiful and headstrong Molly Taylor.
